short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small extension to see how much money you have 'invested' in CS cases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to analyse your CS case history.
Simply install, go to your steam inventory history (Inventory > Three Dots in the top right corner > Inventory History) and let it run.
